name: Smart Fitness Assistant
desc: Intelligent multi-layer physique analysis system using AI: Sapiens Segmentation, EfficientNetV2 Classification, and Gemini Analysis.

name: ViEn Translator
desc: End-to-end Neural Machine Translation (NMT) system using the Transformer architecture, built from scratch.

name: Connect4 AI Agent
desc: A simple Connect4 game simulation using the AlphaZero algorithm. Built using Python, Rust, and PyTorch.

name: Bang Bang Game
desc: A simple but addictive game. Built using C++ and SDL2.

name: Library Management System
desc: A simple library management system. Built using Java, JavaFX, and MySQL.

name: Music Player
desc: A simple music player. Built using JavaScript, NodeJS, and ReactJS.
